title: Oil jumps 4% after Vance says Iran ignored key U.S. demands, military strikes on the table
summary_full: Oil traders are worried that war between the U.S. and Iran could lead to a major disruption of crude supplies in the Middle East.
summary_public: Oil traders are worried that war between the U.S. and Iran could lead to a major disruption of crude supplies in the Middle East.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: war between the U.S. and Iran could lead to a major disruption
